.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-vkGetDeviceMemoryCommitment-device-parameter]] pname:device must: be a valid sname:VkDevice handle
* [[VUID-vkGetDeviceMemoryCommitment-memory-parameter]] pname:memory must: be a valid sname:VkDeviceMemory handle
* [[VUID-vkGetDeviceMemoryCommitment-pCommittedMemoryInBytes-parameter]] pname:pCommittedMemoryInBytes must: be a valid pointer to a basetype:VkDeviceSize value
* [[VUID-vkGetDeviceMemoryCommitment-memory-parent]] pname:memory must: have been created, allocated, or retrieved from pname:device
****
